title: Add Favorite Landmark
name: Add_Favorite_Landmark
description: A route to patch one favorite landmark from the database, based on given Id.

Error 4xx.description: Statuscode 404 and message "no landmark found" are returned.

title: get account by ID
name: Get_account_by_ID
description: A route to get one Account from the database, based on given Id.

Error 4xx.description: Statuscode 404 and message "no landmark found" are returned.

title: Patch account by ID
name: Patch_account_by_ID
description: A route to get one Account from the database, based on given Id.

Error 4xx.description: Statuscode 404 and message "no landmark found" are returned.

title: Remove Favorite Landmark
name: Remove_Favorite_Landmark
description: A route to patch one favorite landmark from the database, based on given Id.

Error 4xx.description: Statuscode 404 and message "no landmark found" are returned.

title: Authenticate
name: Authenticate
description: Route to generate a token for the logged in user.

Success 200.description: The user is redirected to the index ('/') page, where it shows the new token

title: Login (get)
name: Login
description: Route to render login page (only on web).

title: Login
name: Login__post_
description: Route to login users (only on web).

Success 200.description: The user is redirected to the index ('/') page, where the user can see his token

title: Logout
name: Logout
description: Route to render logout page (only on web).

title: Register
name: Register
description: Route to register users (both on web and android).

Success 200.description: The user is redirected to the index ('/') page

Error 4xx.description: The user is redirected to the register ('/') page, and gets a message that says the username is already taken

title: Register with Facebook Token
name: Register_facebook_token
description: Route to register users (both on web and android).

title: Dislike a landmark
name: Dislike_landmark__short_
description: A route to dislike a Landmarks in the database, with limited information.

title: Get all landmarks
name: Get_all_landmarks
description: A route to get all the Landmarks in the database.

title: Get all landmarks (short)
name: Get_all_landmarks__short_
description: A route to get all the Landmarks in the database, with limited information.

Success 200.description: All the Landmarks are shown, with limited information (only id, lat and long are shown)

title: Get all landmarks by country
name: Get_all_landmarks_by_country
description: A route to get all the Landmarks by country in the database.

title: Get landmark by Id
name: Get_landmark_by_Id
description: A route to get one Landmark from the database, based on given Id.

title: Insert a Landmark
name: Insert_a_Landmark
description: A route insert a Landmarks.

title: Like a landmark
name: Like_landmark__short_
description: A route to like a Landmarks in the database, with limited information.

title: Change Password (get)
name: changePassword
description: Route to render change password page (only on web).

title: Change Password
name: changePassword_post
description: Route to handle the change password post (only on web).

Parameter.description: The email that the user used to register his account

Success 200.description: A message containing "An email has been sent to your address." will be shown.

title: Refresh Token
name: refreshToken
description: Route to handle the password reset post (only on web).

Parameter.description: The token that the user received in the email

title: Reset Password
name: resetpassword
description: Route to handle the password reset post (only on web).

Parameter.description: The token that the user received in the email

Success 200.description: The following message will be shown: "Success! Your password has been changed."

Error 4xx.description: The following message will be shown: "Password reset token is invalid or has expired"

title: Reset Password (get)
name: resetpassword_get
description: Route to render the password reset page (only on web) if the token is correct.

Parameter.description: The token that the user recieved in the email

Error 4xx.description: The following message will be shown: "Password reset token is invalid or has expired"

title: TokenTest
name: TestToken
description: A route to simply test if the given token is correct.

title: TokenTest (Android)
name: TestToken__Android_
description: A route to simply test if the given token is correct.
